With that cloud hanging over him, Jeremiah starts with his cows, praying for a miracle.  Still, he's not able to get a drop of milk.  Cursing himself after every failure, he finally makes it to Jessie, his oldest cow.  He halfheartedly starts to milk her, when to his surprise, she gives milk!  It's not a lot, but its enough to make one shipment, and to get a little bit of money coming in.

Our story begins at Mission Dolores Park, located in the heart of San Francisco, California. This large, beautiful park, which offers over thirteen acres of green grass and palm trees, including tennis courts, a soccer field, a basketball court, a playground, and a dog play area, so there is plenty to see and do for people of all ages.

With so much to do, it's perfectly understandable that people will become hungry... and thirsty after a while. This is where men like Sherman Jones come in. Sherman pushes his little cart onto the park grounds every day and sets up shop as soon as the gates open. He sets up in the shade, so that he - and his customers - can stay cool. His cart has a small compartment underneath which has a drawer which is filled with ice cubes, so anything kept in there can remain nice and cold for several hours. Sherman keeps cans of soda, sandwiches, and a few cartons of milk in there, for those customers who prefer to drink something that is healthy.

Sherman picks up his fresh food and drinks from his supplier before pushing his cart into the park, just down the road. He gets customers of all ages, speaking many different languages ranging from Spanish to Chinese to Japanese and even some French and Korean thrown in now and then. But Sherman treats everyone equally with kindness and respect, from the youngest child to the oldest customer.

Today was no exception. Sherman picked up his fresh fruit, drinks and cartons of milk, including one carton which had slightly modified milk in it. Unknown to Sherman, he would end up selling that carton of milk to someone that day, and that act would end up changing that person's life forever.

His mother had gone to the store with his little sister, so what better thing to do then to hang out at the big park with some of the other kids?

Charlie was an active, happy kid. His father was from Hong Kong, and his mom was from Shanghai. He was born in San Francisco and he had never been anywhere else. He loved soccer and baseball, and this was the time of year that all the kids loved to be out in the park kicking the old soccer ball around. Plus, being fifteen years old and only having two or three good friends meant only having a few places to hang out during the long, hot and humid summer.

The weather was nice today and he was happy that it wasn’t raining. The wind had kicked up, but it still made it a nice day to go out to the park and to kick some ball. A bunch of kids were out on the soccer field, so they had enough to create a team. Charlie scored a goal, and that had made his day. 113331.content:
At first Andy thought the house rattling was due to a minor earthquake. Growing up in San Francisco, he had experienced a few of them during the thirteen years of his life; they weren't a regular occurrence by any means but hardly unheard of. But the rattling was too uneven and too focused on his house to be from plate movements. It almost sounded as if there was a large animal knocking things over in the room next door. Ryan's room.

A little nervous, Andy nevertheless stood up and walked out of his room and to the closed door of his younger brother's bedroom, knocking on it. "Ryan? Are you okay?"

"YEAH!" his brother practically seemed to yell back. "You won't believe what happened, Andy!"

Confused, Andy slowly opened the door, letting out a yelp of surprise when he saw the figure before him stretching from the floor to the ceiling. He was so caught off guard that it took him a few seconds to realize he was looking at his brother!

"R-Ryan?" he gulped. "What— how—?"

"I know!" Ryan beamed down at his formerly bigger brother. "Isn't it GREAT?!" His voice, still childish and giddy, was also significantly louder than before, echoing throughout the house. He looked down at Andy, his smile only getting wider. "Hey, I'm even bigger than YOU now!"

"Uh, yeah— you're quite a bit bigger," Andy slowly nodded as he tried to process what he was seeing. He had gone through a bit of his own growth spurt recently, going from a modest five-foot to a respectable 5'4" over the course of a year or so, though he had always secretly wished he could've grown a little more. But this was beyond anything he had ever heard of before! Ryan not only had more than doubled his height in a few minutes, he had done it without losing his stout, boyish proportions. He still looked like a ten-year-old boy— just one that was taller than any adult!

All of this brought forth so many questions. What could this mean? Was that dent in the ceiling caused by his head?! What would happen to Ryan at school the next day? Or to Andy, for that matter? And, perhaps most importantly, what would their mom think when she got home that evening?

While Andy was still racking his brain looking for answers, Ryan suddenly started to walk over to the mirror in the bedroom. Even his casual steps rattled the floors and windows, causing the closet door to pop open and more bits of plaster to rain down from the ceiling from the dent. As he reached the mirror, he giggled as he realized it only reflected his body from the stomach down. He nevertheless tried to flex before it more just for fun. "How strong do you think I am now?" he asked Andy as he posed. "Do you think I could, like, lift a car or something?"

"Uh, I— I don't know," Andy replied as he blew the hair out of his eyes. "How did this happen, anyways?"

Ryan turned around to face his brother, shrugging. "Beats me. I was just doing some squats, like I had said I was gonna. I did like ten or thirty or something, and suddenly: BOOM! My head bumps into the ceiling!"

"O-okay." That seemed to be missing some details, Andy thought, but it was probably the best he was going to get from the excitable young boy. "Did you do anything different today?"

"Nope," Ryan shook his head. "Just school and baseball practice."

"Did you take any medicine, or eat or drink anything unusual?"

Ryan thought for a moment. "Not really. No medicine, that's for sure. And I didn't eat anything out of the ordinary today. Frosted mini-wheats for breakfast, and taco salad from the cafeteria at lunch. Oh, and some milk during baseball practice."

"Milk?" Andy scrunched up his nose. "Where did you get that from?"

"From the snack cart at the park."

"Hmmm," Andy sat on Ryan's bed for a moment, lost in thought. He had been to a few of Ryan's practices and all of his games, and he didn't recall seeing any specific snack cart there, though it didn't sound like something that unusual.

"Hey, don't worry about it so much, Andy." Ryan took a step closer. "I know it things may be weird now that I'm the 'big brother'," he said, putting emphasis on the last two words. "But I promise things will— WHOA!"

He was stopped by the sound of wood splintering, as he had tried to sit down on the bed next to Andy. This turned out to be a mistake, as the wooden bed frame was not even close to being able to support his new weight, and quickly began to break. Both Andy and Ryan jumped to their feet, looking at the now-sagging bed. Ryan's grin turned sheepish as he saw what he had just accidentally done. "Whoops."

Andy shook his head, grinning. "You may be larger than me now," he said, "but I think you might need your actual 'big brother' to still help you out and look out for you, know what I'm saying?"

Ryan chuckled and wrapped his big, thick arms around Andy, pulling him towards him in a hug. "I guess it's good I have you then to help, huh, Andy?"

His face buried in his brother's stomach, Andy could only reply with a muffled "Mmmhmm".

The three boys and the two girls took their seats at the large, round table, which was standing in the far corner of the busy high school cafeteria at JFK High School. The lunch hour had just begun, and the usual groups of students were standing in line with their trays in hand, waiting to be served by the kitchen staff. They picked from a small selection of food items what they wanted, and the members of the kitchen staff scooped of the food on plastic plates. Finally, they were each given plastic silverware, before they reached the area where the drinks were being served.

William pointed at the small milk carton, and the lady grabbed it and handed it to him. He smiled, knowing that his mom would be pleased. She wanted him to only eat healthy food, and it was a major concern since William was slightly overweight and short for his age. Finally, he walked over to the table in the corner, where he sat down and joined Kenny, Alan, Julie and Jenny.

“So much for eating all the healthy stuff…” Willy sighed. “My mom will kill me if I drink too much soda!”

“Yeah… Well, I guess we’re all drinking milk these days…” Kenny said, as he looked at the carton on his tray.

“I don’t mind the milk… It’s the veggies that I hate!” Alan grumbled. “Look at this stuff!”

“That’s spinach, Alan!” Jenny pointed out. “It’s good for you!”

“I hate spinach!” Alan groused. “Yuck!”

“Give it to me…” Willy grinned. “I’ll eat it!”

“Willy eats everything!” Kenny laughed out loud. “That’s why he’s so fat!”

“I’m not fat!” Willy protested. “I’m just a little heavy, that’s all…”

Just then, Carl, one of the guys on the wrestling team, walked past the table.

“Hello, girls… I guess all five girls at this table are drinking milk today, huh?” he said, taunting the three boys.

“Shut up Carl!” Kenny shouted back. “Go pick on someone your own size!”

“If you think that by drinking milk you’re gonna get as big as me, I got some bad news for you! It takes hard work to get big and strong like me!” Carl said, as he made a fist and flexed his right arm, revealing his large, eighteen-inch bicep.

All three boys, Alan, Willy and Kenny just looked at Carl with disgust as the big, muscular bully strolled past their table, mocking them as usual.

“That overgrown moron!” Willy growled. “One of these days…”

“Oh, hush, Willy…” Alan said calmly. “What are you gonna do? He’s twice as big as you and he’s got three times as much muscle as you got fat!”

For the next five minutes, the five kids quietly ate their hamburger with fries and green beans or spinach, and they drank their cartons of milk. William was the first to note the strange taste of the milk.

“I don’t know if it was me, but the milk had a funny taste to it…” he wondered.

“Yeah… “Kenny affirmed.

Julie brought her open carton to her nose and she took a whiff at it.

“Usually I can smell it when the milk has gone bad…” she remarked. “The expiration date on the carton is still two weeks from now… So it has to be good!”

“Great!” Kenny wondered. “If I get sick now, then my parents are gonna call the school district and complain, and they’re gonna call the health department, and who knows what’s gonna happen next?”

“You’re not gonna get sick! The milk is still fresh!” Julie assured him. “I know what spoiled milk smells like, and this isn’t spoiled at all.”

“That’s a relief…” Kenny sighed.

Just then the bell rang and the five teens got up to deliver their trays to the table at the entrance before tossing their leftovers in the trash. All five of them had finished their portion of milk, and they just had two periods of class left that day. Obviously, it would take some time for the contaminated milk to take effect on their bodies. "Thirsty much?" Nic said with a laugh. "A little." Shayne said, his stomach starting to rumble. "Are you ok? Need to use the toilet?" "I...don't think so... Just a little indigestion, that's all." Shayne said as...

12112.content:
Shayne was overcome by a terrible soreness in his muscles as he sat in his chair. The longer he sat there, in the back corner of the cafeteria, the worse it got.

“Nic…” he whispered to his boyfriend. “I… I don’t… I don’t feel too good…”

“What’s wrong? Do you need to puke?” Nic asked him, as he reached out and gently held his hand. Nic became genuinely concerned for his friend. “Are you alright?”

“I… I don’t know… I feel like… I’m coming down with a terrible cramp or something…”

Nic immediately stood up and grabbed hold of Shayne’s hand.

“Come on… You look pale, dude… Let’s go to the bathroom…” Nic ordered as Shayne slowly stood up. “You look like you’re getting sick or something…”

Nic pulled Shayne behind him as he forcefully marched out of the cafeteria, ignoring the taunts and teases of some of the other guys who always picked on them for being a gay couple. As soon as they made it to the hallway, it was only a short walk to the restroom, which was just around the corner.

Once inside the bathroom, Shayne hung over the toilet first, coughing a few times but nothing came out but a little bit of spit. Then, Shayne slowly stood up and opened the stall door and walked out, stumbling over to the long counter where the sinks were located, with a large mirror attached to the wall. He got some water and washed his face, drying everything off with some paper towels while Nic looked on.

“Are you okay?” Nic asked him again.

“Dude… I feel weird… My body is all sore and tingly…” Shayne said softly as he leaned against the counter.

“Should I go get the nurse?” Nic wondered. “Maybe you should go to your dorm!”

“I… Uhh… I…” Shayne groaned the moment he was overcome by a very strange feeling which swept over every muscle in his body.

Then Shayne let out a loud growl as he tensed up. He clenched his fists and gritted his teeth while he craned his neck back as Nic looked on.

“Shayne? SHAYNE! What the hell is going on?”

Shayne’s biceps suddenly began to inflate like balloons! His triceps followed suit, making his shirt sleeves rip on both ends! His forearms quickly followed afterwards, ripping down the middle up to his wrists as his arms thickened into big, hard pythons of muscle!

“ARRRGGHHHH!!!” Shayne roared as every muscle in his upper body expanded within seconds!

His pectorals ballooned out of his chest, growing forward and sideways at the same time, expanding his shoulders all at once. His abdominal muscles formed as well, turning his flat stomach into a washboard of ridges resembling a tiled kitchen floor! Rows and columns of thick buttons came to the surface as his entire torso expanded and widened into a wide V-shape. Mighty lats grew out from under his arms, supporting the enlarged muscles which sprouted so quickly! And, all this happened so quickly, at the expense of the nice, white buttoned long-sleeve shirt which Shayne was wearing! Every button on the shirt popped off as Shayne’s chest expanded to the point where the shirt ripped down the middle from the collar to the waist, not to mention his sleeves and his arms!

“DUDE! You’re destroying your shirt!” Nic shouted as he saw Shayne bursting out of his shirt before his very own eyes. “What the hell is going on?”

“AHHHH…. NIC! MY… MUSCLES… ARE… BLOWING UP!” Shayne shouted between gasps as the mysterious growth traveled to his legs.

Shayne’s nice long dress slacks tore from his groin to his ankles, at each leg, when his quads practically doubled in width and his calves turned into massive soccer balls of rock-hard muscle power.

RRRRRIPPPPPPP!!!!! CRACKKKKKK!

Finally, the strange growth spurt stopped, leaving Shayne standing there, with his clothing ripped to shreds as he had suddenly gained over forty pounds of muscle in just a few seconds. His face was completely red as he was drenched in sweat.

“Nic… NIC!” Shayne shouted. “Get… Get me home!”

“Oh… Okay dude… We’ll get you some clothes to wear at the dorm…” Nic said as he wrapped his arm around Shayne’s widened shoulder.

Nic and Shayne then walked out of the bathroom and through the hallway just as the bell rang. They ran out the back door and then escaped through the back gate to get back to the building where the dorms were located. Once they were in their room, they locked the door behind them.

“Okay, dude… Take off those ripped clothes… Let’s see your ripped body instead!” Nic grinned.

Shayne just glared at him for a moment. Shayne was extremely shy, insecure and timid. He had no idea what had just happened to him in the bathroom and in the cafeteria. All he knew is that he had gained a ton of bulk and weight in his muscles. The question was what was going to happen to him now?
12112.title: He grew more muscular!

choices: Shayne has another growth spurt at school
Shayne starts growing taller as well
121121.content:
Nic and Shayne were extremely glad to be back in the dorm room. Nic immediately closed and locked the door and he closed the curtains and the windows before he turned to face his roommate.

“Okay, big guy… Off with the clothes… Now!” Nic ordered, with his arms folded before his chest.

“Ohh man… Do I really have to?” Shayne asked him with a sad expression on his face.

“Take them OFF!” Nic commanded.

“Alright, alright…” Shayne sighed, as he started to remove his sneakers. His shirt was already ripped to shreds so that came off easily, revealing his incredibly muscular upper body. Then, he pulled off his jeans which had holes in them. Finally, he was standing there in just his underwear.

Nic’s jaw practically dropped to the floor when he saw his boyfriend standing before him. He had never seen a human being with so many big muscles in his life, other than in a magazine or on TV. Before him, was his tall, shy and timid boyfriend, with broad shoulders, bulging pectorals, ripped abdominal muscles, thick, round biceps, and two legs which looked like pillars of muscle which he had never seen before in his entire life.

“Shayne! What the hell happened to you?” Nic gasped as he examined Shayne’s muscular frame. Nic walked up to the boy and pressed his hands against Shayne’s chest and biceps, feeling the hardness of his enlarged muscles. “You look like you just spent a year in the gym lifting weights!”

“Dude… I have never lifted a weight in my life! You know that!” Shayne said shyly. “I just had lunch in the cafeteria and before I knew it my muscles started to grow like crazy!”

“Well… Let’s just chill out and relax…” Nic sighed. “I’ll go find some bigger clothes for you to wear since my mom works in a clothing store, we should have some bigger clothes for you somewhere…”

Nic got some bigger sweat pants and a sweat shirt for Shayne to wear out of a storage box, which Shayne put on right away. Then, the boys ate some pizza before they played some video games. Finally, the two boys turned off the lights and went to sleep. They were roommates, and they shared the same bedroom. They had known each other for years, ever since the first grade, so that was no problem.

The next morning, Shayne got up first, wondering if the experiences from the previous day were just part of a dream. When he stood in front of the mirror, he was greeted by his muscular body in the reflection in the mirror.

“Wow! I’m stronger than I was yesterday!” Shayne noticed. “So strange… I wonder what made me grow like that.”

Nic woke up and got some cereal with milk out of the pantry. He poured two bowls and invited Shayne to join him for breakfast. The boys ate quietly as they talked about the classes for the day.

Shayne cleaned up the dishes and put them away after he washed them in the sink. It took him only five minutes to wash and dry everything.

While he was wiping down the table in the kitchen, he was suddenly overcome by that weird, tingling sensation again. This was the same tingling feeling he felt the previous day at the classroom building, before he had his first growth spurt.

“Uhhh…. Oh no… Not again…. Nic… NIC!” he shouted, as he stood in the kitchen by the table.

Nic immediately came running out of the bedroom. He was about to take a shower when he heard Shayne shout his name.

“Shayne! What? What’s going on?” he asked, as he came running.

“It… It’s starting again…” Shayne groaned, as the weird tingling spread all across his legs first, before traveling up his torso, his chest and his shoulders. “I’m… I’m cramping up… Just… like… yesterday!”

Then it happened! Shayne let out a loud roar! His pectorals, which were already bigger than normal, now inflated even MORE! They pushed outwards and sideways, become REALLY big! His biceps followed suit, growing another inch in size! His torso seemed to widen a little more and his quads quickly grew an inch or so wider as well which his calves hardened and inflated like a big balloon. Everything happened really fast, but Nic was able to see Shayne’s muscles expand before his eyes!

“UUUUHHHHHHHH!!!” Shayne moaned loudly, as the short growth spurt took place. It ended abruptly, leaving Shayne even bigger than before! His muscles were big at first, but now his muscles were just ENORMOUS!

“NIC! NIC!!!” Shayne cried out. “HELP ME!”

Shayne was panting and gasping as he leaned up against the kitchen table, sweating like mad. His face was red as a tomato!

“Holy crap, dude! You’re even BIGGER now!” Nic said, as he rushed towards Shayne and wrapped his arm against his friend’s torso and shoulder. But, Nic couldn’t really push or pull his friend anymore. Shayne was now much heavier than him.

“Lay down, dude… Just relax!” Nic said, leading his best friend back to the bedroom. Then, he squatted down as Shayne laid down on his bed. Before Nic could get up, Shayne reached over and pulled him towards him with his powerful grip. For the first time, Nic realized that Shayne had become much stronger than him.

“Stay… Please… Stay with me…” Shayne said, pulling Nic towards him to the point where Nic was pressed up against his muscular body. “I’m scared…”

Nic couldn’t move! He was trapped in Shayne’s powerful, muscular arms. On the other hand, he saw fear and insecurity in Shayne’s eyes. But, Shayne just looked so amazingly handsome with those huge muscles right now. It turned him on, now that he was imprisoned in Shayne’s powerful, steel grip.

The question that went through Nic’s mind was: How big would Shayne become?
121121.title: Shayne keeps on having muscle growth spurts eve...

Shayne goes to a pool or beach party and he has another growth spurt
1211211.content:
Nic was totally amazed. Before him, on the bed in his dorm room, there lay Shayne, his roommate and his boyfriend. But compared to the previous day, his boyfriend had suddenly gained about fifty pounds of muscle! He was still the same goofy, shy, timid and loving guy as always, standing at 6-feet-tall with his tanned skin and wavy brown hair and blue eyes. But, he was BIG and STRONG! He looked like he had spent the past year working out in the gym for about four hours a day, every single day. Both guys, at age 16, had always been about the same age and the same height but Nic had always been the “leader” in the relationship. Would that change now that Shayne had suddenly become bigger and stronger?

“Hey, sweetie…” Nic whispered, as he stood next to the bed. “Are you feeling alright? Do you want to stay home from school?”

“Uhhmmm…” Shayne yawned as he stretched out his thick, muscular arms. “No, I’m fine… I just needed a few minutes to recover from that growth spurt!”

Then with renewed energy, the muscle boy leaped out of bed and raced to the bathroom where he jumped in the shower. Moments later, he came out, dried off, and dashed back to the bedroom where he got dressed very quickly. He then ran into the kitchen and made a sandwich while Nic was already there, eating his cereal.

“Wow! That was fast!” Nic said surprisingly. “You’re never so full of energy in the morning!”

“Uhh yeah, I know! All these muscles just make me feel really pumped up right now!” Shayne grinned as he put on his shoes and wolfed down his sandwich. “I got so much energy…. I feel so strong… I feel like a new person! It’s so weird!”

“Alright, Hercules! Let’s get going to school otherwise we’ll be facing detention for being late!” Nic said, as he grabbed his bag and started heading out the door. The boys walked out and rushed down the street towards the school, which was only a block away from their dorm.

As soon as the boys arrived, everyone started giving Shayne weird stares and looks. It was only the previous day that Shayne just looked like a very ordinary, tall, skinny and geeky high school student, when today he looked like a very athletic, muscular and hulking muscle boy!

Everywhere he went, people kept on staring at him.

“Shayne, is that you?”

“Hey Shayne, did you work out all night long?”

“Hey Shayne, are you on super-steroids?”

“What the hell happened to Shayne?”

“That can’t be Shayne, could it?”

Pretty soon, everybody was talking about Shayne. How could one boy become so muscular overnight?

It was finally the last period of the day and the guys had their last class… P.E.! The boys went into the locker room and changed into their shorts, t-shirts and running shoes. When they came outside, Coach Jones ordered them all to run three laps around the track which encircled the football field.

Surprisingly enough, Shayne was feeling very fit and he found himself sprinting past everybody very early on. His very muscular legs gave him the power to zoom past the entire class, including Nic, as Shayne easily soared past every single boy until he was the first running on the track. Then he blazed past the end zone until he crossed the line where the coach was standing, leaving everybody else in the dust, almost half a lap behind him!

“Come on, you guys!” Shayne shouted at them. “Go! Go! Goooooo!”

As all the other guys finally crossed the line one-by-one, Nic walked up to him.

“Alright…. Shayne… what do you think you are?” Nic said while panting from running. “The Flash?”

“Oh come on! I wasn’t even running my fastest!” Shayne sighed. “You guys are slow!”

Nic and Shayne then walked over to the water fountain, which was behind the bleachers. This was away from where the track was, so the other guys couldn’t see them.

“Dude! Hold back on the muscle, okay? Everybody in school is freaking out right now!” Nic said to his boyfriend, who was also his roommate. “It’s not normal for a guy to gain fifty pounds of muscle overnight! Half the guys think you’re on steroids or something!”

“But, I’m NOT!” Shayne shouted as he had his muscular arms extended sideways. “I’m not on ANYTHING! I can’t explain these growth spurts! Honest!”

“Dude! I know that! But still… People are gonna question how a skinny, tall guy like you became buff overnight….” Nic argued.

But, at that very moment, Shayne was experiencing that familiar cramping up feeling in his legs. He closed his eyes, gritted his teeth and craned his neck. Then he let out a loud moan…

“I mean, nobody grows that fast…. Uhh…. Shayne? Are you alright? SHAYNE?” Nic shouted in panic when he realized that Shayne’s face had turned pale.

“Uhhh…. UHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!” Shayne groaned loudly as his body shook for a brief moment.

“Oh no! He’s having a seizure! Or…. He’s gonna GROW!” Nic gasped.

Shayne’s legs slowly shivered before his calves ballooned even BIGGER than they were before, growing into big, large, round rock-hard spheres of power-packed muscles which were the size of basketballs implanted in his legs. Large lumps of muscles filled with rocket-powered strength needed to propel the boy high into the air, giving him an insane vertical leap that any basketball player would envy.

Next, his quads widened and deepened into thick, big and long pillars of strength between his knees and his groin, which were unlike any quads anybody else could boast or brag about. Thick layers of nuclear powered muscle exploded all over his sewer-pipe quads, making his legs resemble hundred-year-old oak tree stumps. Shayne was quickly growing the biggest, longest and widest legs in the world, as his legs grew thicker, wider and deeper while Nic looked on in total and complete awe!

Nic looked on a realized something as Shayne stood before him as his legs kept growing wider and deeper with new muscle, his legs started growing LONGER as well, propelling his torso further from ground and as a result, making the boy grow TALLER!

“HOLY SHIT!” Nic gasped as he witnessed his best friend grow about 7 inches taller before his very eyes, and all that height was added to his thick, super-muscular legs within just a few seconds!

When the growth spurt ended, Shayne opened his eyes while his face and shirt were drenched in sweat! He was completely soaked!

“Oh God… Oh my God…. Ohhhhmygod….” Shayne was panting as he was gasping for air while his face was red as a tomato. “Nic…. NIC! Where are you?”

”I’m here! I’m right here!” Nic shouted as he now had to look UP to Shayne for the very first time as he ran up to the boy and embraced him. “Down here, big guy!”

“NIC! OHMYGAWD… YOU SHRUNK!”

“No dude, you grew by 6 or 7 inches… and your legs gained a TON of muscle!” Nic replied calmly.

Shayne tried to take a step forward, but he lost his balance and stumbled backwards, falling on the grass and taking Nic with him.

“Ohhhh…. I’m not used to being so TALL…” Shayne groaned. “I got dizzy…”

Nic tried to break free from Shayne’s powerful grip but Shayne was holding on to him much too tight. Shayne was pressing him against his bigger, muscular body and Nic just couldn’t come up with the strength to break free!”

“Uhhh… Shayne! Let me go…. I can’t get… loose…” Nic groaned.

“But I wanna cuddle up with you, Nic…” Shayne said calmly as he held on tight. “I love you like crazy…. I just feel like I love you more than ever right now… All these muscles just made me love you MORE…”

“Urggg…. That’s fine but…. I can’t move, Shayne!” Nic groaned. “Let… me… go!”

Shayne just stared his boyfriend in the eyes and gave him a lazy look. He was really calm as Nic continued to struggle. Then, Nic realized that he couldn’t get free from Shayne’s mighty grip no matter how hard he tried.

“I’ll let you go whenever I feel like it…” Shayne said calmly. “I’m bigger and stronger than you so I’ll hug you and cuddle you as long as I want… I’m in charge now…”

Nic stopped struggling when he heard those words. His jaw dropped open. Shayne had become the alpha male in the relationship now. He was the leader.

Before he could say anything, Shayne pulled Nic towards him and planted a big, slobbering kiss on his forehead…

1213.content:
The milk made its way into the entire school's supply, and was served to all the boys that day. The lunchroom monitor, Mrs. Parsons, was very strict on making sure that all the boys got a full balanced meal, including drinking all their serving of milk. This annoyed the older students, but Mrs. Parsons was very strict, and had several creative ways of punishing boys who didn't comply with her orders.

So that day, all five hundred boys in the school drank their milk as normal. They went through the rest of the day as normal. They went home as normal. But after this day, nothing would be normal again.

They went to sleep at various times throughout the night, and as they slept, the milk made its changes to each of the boys.

12132.content:
*NOTE* At this point, I'm having the story follow one of the boys, though this can always be changed in later chapters.

Luke awoke with a shiver. He was a handsome boy, skinny and a bit on the short side for being 13, with spiky bright red hair and a fair complexion. He loved playing football, but was usually outmatched by the taller and stronger boys in his class. He was somewhat of a loner, but had a few good friends he could count on. His family, though, was a different story. He didn't get along with anyone in it: his brother, his two sisters, and least of all his parents. Each night he wished there was some way he could get rid of them.

As he turned over, he heard the sound of boards and mortar breaking, and noticed he wasn't in his normal bed. He sat up, rubbed his eyes and looked around. It was then he noticed that he was outside, and sitting on what looked like debris. He was also naked, which wasn't how he remembered going to sleep as.

He looked up. He seemed to be surrounded by doll houses, but ones that were incredibly realistic. In fact, they looked almost exactly like those that made up his neighborhood...

It suddenly hit him--he was actually sitting in his neighborhood, and either everything had shrunk overnight, or, as he thought was more likely, he had somehow grown to a tremendous height! His first instinct was one of fear, but then he thought of how cool it was! He brushed the remains of his house off of his lap and stood up. As he did so, what was left standing collapsed. He chuckled a bit at all the destruction he was able to cause.

At this point, he noticed that, a few houses over, his best friend Ethan was also just waking up, and was also sitting in the remains of his house. He walked over to where Ethan was, just a few steps for the now-titanic Luke. Ethan was the same age as Luke, but (at their normal heights) was almost a foot taller with a swimmer's build (being a star swimmer), having hit his growth spurt early. He had shaggy jet-black hair that covered his ears, and an even more fair complexion than Luke. Ethan and Luke had known each other practically since they were born; their families went back several generations. They played a lot as kids, often wrestling each other, which was an even match until the past year or so as Ethan started sprouting up. Luke was slightly jealous of Ethan for his physical gifts, but didn't let that overcome their good friendship.

Luke stood in front of Ethan as he was finally sitting up, becoming aware of what had happened to him. He looked up into Luke's smiling face. "What's happened to us?" he asked.

"See for yourself," Luke replied. He reached out a hand and helped Ethan up.

"We're-- we're giants!" Ethan replied. He smiled, surveying the remains of his house around him. He finally looked back up to Luke, noticing that, instead of looking down at him like normal, he now only came up to his chest.

"Wow!" Ethan said, "looks like you finally got that growth spurt. And you're nude!"

"So are you!" Luke said. "But it's not like we've never seen each other naked before. We've got nothing to hide."

Luke gave Ethan a playful shove. He didn't know his own strength, though, and sent Ethan flying back down with a loud THUD on the ground. "Ow!" Ethan said as he stood up, rubbing his backside.

As they looked around them, they noticed other boys from their school in the distance who were also waking up to a big surprise. "Looks like we're not the only ones," Luke said. They decided to go into town to explore what had happened to them and their classmates.

1221.content:
Another school day, another day of sitting all alone inside the canteen. Anna Wilson was used to it by now. Being from the lower class she was used to being belittled by her fellow students and peers. Even most of the teachers didn't like her. Sure, they didn't falsify her grades because it would reflect poorly on them, but that didn't stop them from being cold towards her. It was only because of her praised intellect that she had been allowed to go to this school.

Anna wasn't that special though. She had only just turned 16 yet was still very plain. Her messy blonde hair that reached her shoulders and slightly framed her face, her emerald eyes, tanned mocha skin due to her ancestry and overall as flat as a board. Anna was quite underdeveloped and her financial status was equally lacking. Therefore she was an outcast to the rest of the students.

No one was left in the canteen that Saturday morning. Anna tended to wait until everyone was gone before having something to eat. That way she avoided being bullied, not that it always worked. The lunch lady was quite nice and understanding, being from a lower class in society as well, so she was allowed to have her irregular meals. Anna was dressed in her school uniform; a blue jacket with the school's symbol imprinted on it, white shirt and grey skirt along with knee-length brown heeled-boots.

"The food is getting worse every day." Anna muttered to herself as she poked the sludge in front of her.

Her current meal consisted out of some sort of yogurt along with a single sausage and beans. Add to that was a single carton of milk. The lunch lady had told her that this milk was from a separate box they had received yesterday. Anna wasn't really a big fan of milk, it just didn't seem appetizing to her.

"Well, well." An obnoxious voice interrupted her meal. "Look at what we have here. If it isn't our local scarecrow."

Anna looked up from her plate to see Amelia Williams, along with her cohorts; Olivia Taylor and Ava Brown. Amelia Williams was of the same age as Anna, the only difference being that she was very wealthy and good looking. The rich girl had long raven hair and beautiful blue eyes while she was quite busty for her age. Even her underlings each had a high standing while also being some of the prettiest girls in the school.

Amelia was loathed by Anna to an almost incredible degree. The girl liked to belittle her and bullied her whenever she liked to. Anna tried to avoid her, yet it proved fruitless like in this instance.

"Leave me alone, Amelia." Anna said quietly, not in the mood for another bullying session.

Amelia sneered, "Who are you to order me around? You stupid peasant."

Anna stayed quiet as Amelia began chewing her out. She was used to the harsh words by now, from Amelia and anyone else. The only friend she had in this dump was Thomas McKinley, a 17 years old concierge who had to work here because of his aunt. Thomas always made her smile. Even when people looked down on her, he was there to help her get back up. Thinking about him gave her some courage to endure the berating at Amelia's hands.

After a few minutes Amelia seemed to have had enough. The girl huffed loudly before turning around without any adieu, her followers close behind her as they left.

Anna sighed to herself as she finally got some peace and rest. She looked down at her meal and suddenly found it less appealing, having lost any hunger she had had before.

"I wish I could show her." Anna muttered out of frustration. "She thinks she so tough, because of her looks and her money. Maybe if I had power I could put her in her place and get some recognition."

The young girl let out another sigh. She might not be hungry anymore, but she was a bit thirsty. Anna picked up the carton of milk and quickly emptied it in one go, downing all of the liquid.

However, suddenly a strange feeling began to well up inside of her. Anna inhaled deeply as she began to feel strange.

Anna groaned and clutched her stomach as a wave of heat, energy and a small tinge of pain coursed through her. The feeling was quite intense, so much that it momentarily dazed her. The blonde girl could practically feel the change in her body as if her skin was stretching and her body was rearranging itself.

Then out of nowhere her muscles actually began to expand! Anna watched through almost closed eyes due to the pain as her shoulders pulsed and slowly expanded. Layers of muscle were added as her deltoids bulged outwards, making her shoulders wider. Her triceps expanded and soon resembled thick ropes while her forearms grew thicker with small veins popping up. Then her eyes landed on her biceps that inflated to a much larger size, one that made it look as if someone had stuffed large grapefruits under her skin. They didn’t just look big but they were also very noticeable and so were the small veins that ran across her soft skin.

Anna let out another groan as the transformation continued and her body kept on adding more muscle. Her legs almost buckled beneath her as her calves started bulging outwards. They increased in size, so much even that they now had a smooth teardrop form. Her quadriceps grew as well, her thighs now more pronounced and thicker while they expanded. But getting wider wasn’t the only thing that her leg muscles did, her legs themselves also got a bit longer, adding a few inches to her height. The blonde’s glutes swelled which made them not only rounder but also firmer.

The heat concentrated in her torso as the muscles there started growing. While she had a lean belly before she now sported a very noticeable set of abs. The small blocky muscles were very pronounced now, they were defined and wide plus if you inspected them closely you could see that the space between the abs was quite deep. The six-pack that she just gained was so majestic that most people in the gym could only attain it after dozens of hard workouts. Thick chords of muscle were visible on her back as they swelled in size and that was a good thing for her. The reason for that was because her pectorals grew outwards, widening to a much larger size to the point that a small line was visible between them. Out of nowhere, small mounds began to steadily increase in size on her mighty pecs, breasts ballooning as they stretched the front of her jacket. If it wasn’t for her stronger back she might have gotten an instantaneous ache in her back because of the weight.

Anna let out a moan and a sigh as the pain faded away along with the intense feeling of her growth. All that she was left with was a new muscular body that most people could only get through hard work and dedication. As her breathing calmed down she fully opened her eyes and inspected her new form. She was sweaty from the experience and it showed as her brand new muscles glistened while her damp clothes stuck to her body.

"What happened to me?!" Anna exclaimed with fright, standing up in the process.

For some reason her body had basically exploded with muscle. Her whole body felt better than ever, more energy and strength than she had ever dreamed of. Clay and Kyle had decided to go outside to the barn, while Craig could stay in bed to get some rest. He was really shaken up by the blow to his head, that he wasn’t feeling all that well.

Inside the barn, Clay and Kyle looked over all the agricultural equipment their dad used to use when ploughing the field. There were all rusted and not used for over 10 years, as the boys were 3 years old when their dad left them. Kyle was wearing an old jeans coverall, with nothing underneath, which displayed his broad shoulders.

Clay approached an old barrel. “Hey Kyle, let me see if you can lift this!”

“Sure thing bro!” Kyle said as he approached the barrel as well. He noticed it was empty. “Hey, it’s empty and made out of aluminium, I bet even you can lift it!”

“You think?” Clay said as he positioned himself in front of it. He bend his knees and grabbed the sides with his hands. After taking a heavy breath, he managed to get it moving. His face was turning red from the force he was applying. For two seconds he managed to lift it up a good 10 inches, before letting it drop to the floor again.

“Well done!” Kyle said “Now, it’s my turn!”

Kyle positioned himself similar to Clay and grabbed hold of the barrel on either side. Without too much effort he managed to lift up the thing to the same height as Clay. He turned his head facing Clay and said “Was this thing causing you so much trouble?” Then he hoisted it up to his chest with ease, much like a professional weightlifter would lift a barbell. He curled it several times, just to annoy Clay, after lifting it all the way up over his head, stretching his arms completely. “This is so fucking light, I can’t believe you couldn’t lift it!?”

Clay watched on in amazement, his jaw dropped open all the way.

Next, with no effort at all, Kyle tossed the barrel to the side, crashing into a wall lined with tools several feet away. “This is kids stuff, let’s continue with something more my weight!”

Clay was dumbstruck. He stood there in the middle of the barn, completely paralyzed, watching the tools crash from the wall as the barrel hit. Kyle put his hand on his brother’s shoulder, squeezing it ever so slightly. “Don’t worry, some day you might catch up!” It hurt.

Kyle walked over to the other side of the barn were some wooden beams lay in a corner. They lay there to be used as spare for the wooden structure of the barn. Kyle can’t remember them not lying there, waiting to be used, but that day never came. The boys used to play around it, hiding away from their mother and using it as a fortress. It had great memory. The beams each weighed at least 300 lbs, something the boys could never lift before.

“Let me see if I can build us one of those forts now."

Kyle approached one beam, squatted in front of it and grabbed it firmly in his hands. Then he began to lift it. It was obvious to Clay that this was much heavier, and thus much more difficult, even for Kyle now. His face was turning red, veins in his neck crawled up and his biceps were tensed. With a lot of effort he managed to get one side of the beam several inches into the air. He was really working it now, sweating all over his body. Then, all of a sudden, he let it drop.

“Was that even too heavy for you, bro?”

Kyle avoided eye contact with his brother out of shame. “Yeah, it was a little heavy indeed...” he muttered.

“Haha, what are you all cranky about all of a sudden!” Kyle remarked.

“Nothing, just let it go!”

“You thought you were able to lift that, didn’t you?”

Now Kyle faced his brother. “Yeah, so what?! I’m still way stronger than you, and much better looking if I may add...” The corner of Kyle’s mouth lifted into half a smile again.

Clay approached his brother, one hand around Kyle’s back, the other one patting his stomach. “That my friend, is undeniably...NOT true!” On the word NOT he hit his brother extra hard in the stomach, fleeing soon after, laughing along the way. “Oh no you didn’t...” Kyle laughed back at his brother, initiating his pursuit.

The two were running through the barn, out into the field, chasing each other along the way. Kyle managed to tackle his brother onto the ground, piling his massive body on top of him. Not soon after, it was Clay’s turn to tackle his brother. With his new build, his brother was top-heavy, so easy to take down. As Kyle lay on the ground, his brother on top of him, he tried something fun. He grabbed Clay by his legs and his back and pushed him up into the air. Then back down, and back up again. He repeated it several times, bench pressing his own brother as barbell. It felt great!

Time flew by quickly, so before they knew it, their mother called them back in for dinner. The boys were both breaking a sweat from the extensive improvised workout they’ve done.

---

Craig was feeling better and was already sitting at the table when Clay and Kyle walked in. Since Kyle had spend the entire afternoon out in the barn and on the field, his mother hadn’t seen his latest growth spurt. Kyle’s broad physique caused him to waddle into the house, with Craig completely hidden right behind him. Janet, holding a casserole in her hands, looked up at her son and stiffened completely. She let the casserole slip out of her hands. Luckily for her, she was holding it just over the table, so it came down with a loud thump. Her mouth was wide open.

Kyle approached her as if nothing was going on. “Oh hi mom!” He kissed her on the cheek as he laid both his hands on her shoulders. The big paws completely covered her thin, feminine, shoulders. “I guess you like what you see?!” Kyle questioned.

Still without saying a word, Janet grabbed her son by his upper arm and squeezed. Then she completely took in her son’s physique, eyeing him up and down several times. Not a sound came out of her mouth, which stood wide open all the time. He looked truly impressive with the sweat glistening off of his body.

“Ma! Don’t drool over your own son!” Clay yelled to break the silence as he sat himself next to Craig.

Janet blinked several times, shook her head and gasped one final time before muttering “Wh-what happened to you?!?”

“If only we knew...” Craig managed to say before Kyle could tell a thing.

“He woke up like this this morning, at least that’s what he told us!” Clay added.

“Yeah mom, it’s true! I don’t know what happened, all I know is that I woke up with a lot of pain this morning, and when I went to the kitchen for a late night snack I passed the full body mirror in the hallway and I noticed my muscles swelling up. I really have no idea why or how, but what I do know is that I’m loving it for 100%"

As he did during both his brother’s discovery, he flexed his arms into a massive biceps peak. Janet couldn’t control herself and grabbed onto the arm with both her hands, feeling the muscle all over.

“Well son, it sounds like a really strange story, but you look fantastic!” She moved her hands over to his pecs. “I guess we should go to the doctors with you tomorrow, maybe he can find out what’s wrong with you?”

“What’s wrong with me?” Kyle said as he grabbed both his mother’s hands and pulled them away from his body. “Like I already told you, nothing is wrong with me, I feel great! Super even! I don’t need to see the doctors, really, I’m fine!” He sat himself down kind of agitated. “Come on, let’s eat...it’s getting cold!”

“Uhm, oh, yeah sure honey. Whatever you say. Did you guys wanted anything to drink?”

Craig grabbed the jug of milk out of the fridge. "All right, fresh milk!" he said.

Clay yanked it from his hands. "Hey, I got first dibs!"

This quickly turned into a playful wrestling match, as was common for these two, with Clay trying to keep the milk away from Craig, and Craig wrapping his arms around Clay in an effort to grab the jug back, knocking the two of them back against the kitchen counter. Kyle walked into the room, saw this, and shook his head. He then sat down at the table, waiting for his brothers to resolve their dispute.

Janet then came back into the room. "The two of you stop that! You gotta be more careful!" She grabbed the milk from Clay, and then herself poured the boys a glass each.

During the dinner, Craig, Clay, and Kyle each drank the milk quickly, and all went back for seconds, finishing the jug off. "You boys go through milk so fast," Jan said, "I swear I have to buy it nearly every day."

Later that night, Jan had already gone to bed, and the three boys were sitting at the TV, playing Halo 3 on their Xbox 360. The match ended, and Clay ended up the winner. He jumped up and started celebrating. "Yeah! Take that, bitches!"

Suddenly, he felt a little dizzy. "Man, we must have been playing too long," he said, as he started to lose his balance.

Craig started feeling it too. "Oh, wow, yeah," he said. "I'm feeling kinda dizzy."

Kyle sat down the controller. "I'm feeling it, too." He said. He rubbed his eyes, and then looked up at Clay, who looked... different. "Something's weird, guys."

Clay looked down, and noticed that his shirt was getting tighter. "Dude," he said, "I think I'm growing!"

"Yeah, me too!" Craig said, as he stood up. He heard a RIPPP sound coming from his pants, looked down, and saw a tear starting to form in the seams/

"What's going on?" Kyle said.

"Whatever it is," Clay said, "this is awesome!"

The three boys continued to grow, their clothes becoming ever tighter. Finally, it stopped, with all three boys heads near the ceiling. The dizzy feeling subsided, and they each looked at each other, too stunned to speak. Their shorts had each ripped, and their shirts were stretched to the limit, all riding up, revealing their lean, fit stomachs.

Clay finally spoke up. "Wow! We must be 8 or 9 feet tall!"

"Yeah," Kyle said, "it feels great!"

"I've never felt so strong!" Craig said, as he flexed. In addition to the height, the three boys' muscles had all been enhanced as well, where they looked like regular gym-goers.

"How do you think this happened?" Kyle asked.

"Who cares?" Clay asked. "Now we're the biggest, strongest 15-year-olds on the planet!"

"Yeah," Craig said. "Imagine everyone's faces at school tomorrow!"

Clay, Craig, and Kyle stayed up for another hour or so, admiring their new bodies, posing and flexing in front of the bathroom mirror. They each went back to their beds that night, barely fitting on them, having to sleep with their legs hanging over the edge. They each floated off into sleep, dreaming of what they could do now at their size.

None of them could know that this was only just the beginning.

Kyle opened his eyes, his nose inches from the ceiling. Blinking several times in shock, he finally looked around and gasped. His bed was still the top of two bunk beds, just like last night, but it seemed a great deal smaller than it had the night before. Whereas last night the edge of the bed matched the bend in his knees, now everything below his waist was hanging free, his feet reaching the floor. He could feel the sides of his legs brush against warm, smooth skin.

Turning his head to the bed on the opposite wall, Kyle saw that Craig was still sleeping, but he was truly a stunning sight. He had subconsciously curled his body into a fetal position while he slept, his knees bent up all the way to his chest while he was lying on his back, but he still couldn't fit his feet on the bed. He was completely naked now, and Kyle could see the shreds of pajamas mixed in with the sheets. His brother now looked almost twice as big as he had been last night.

Looking down at his own body, Kyle noticed that he, too, had gone through the same thing, and now was nude. Peering over the side to the bed below his confirmed that Clay had also grown much the same during the night. Kyle couldn't tell how big he and his brothers each were now, but it definitely was am impressive amount.

"Pssst!" Kyle hissed at his other two brothers. When neither of them responded, he rolled out of bed, careful not to bump his head on the ceiling, each of his feet making a loud THUD when they hit the floor. Crouching over in the middle of the room, he could reach out a massive arm on either side and touch both of his brothers' shoulders at the same time. He gave them each a firm shake.

"Whazzat?" Clay woke up first, rubbing his eyes. He sat up too quickly and hit his head on the bed frame above him. "OOOWWWWW!" he cried out, rubbing his head in pain.

"Careful!" Kyle couldn't help but laugh a little At his brother's misfortune. "We've, uh... We've had a bit of a change occur during the night."

Yawning and smacking his lips, Craig sat up without a word. As he did so, his bed, already weakened by the intense and increasing weight it had to support during the night, began to creak under his shifting body, eventually splintering and collapsing under the boy's size. Kyle jumped back a little in shock, as Craig's bare ass hit the floor and he yelped. "What the--" he shouted, befuddled.

All three boys were now wide awake, and stared at each other and themselves, marveling in silence for several minutes. Kyle was the first to say something. "Pretty awesome, right guys?"

"Are you kidding?" Craig asked, beaming in utter delight. "We're the biggest people ever! How cool is that?!"

"Imagine what we could get away with now that we're this big!" Clay mused. "No one can tell us to do anything we don't want to! We can rule this town!"

"Yeah..." Kyle said thoughtfully, starting to come down off of the high of becoming so big. "Let's just not get ahead of ourselves. We might have a problem." He pointed to the doorframe. "How the heck are we supposed to fit through that thing?"

14122.content:
The next morning, they all woke up about the same time, still excited about their growth. Janet had already left for work, so she didn't get to see her new giant sons. Each of them tried to find clothes to wear for school, with little success. Kyle was able to squeeze into his formerly baggy basketball jersey (now skin tight) and shorts, which on him now looked like the "short shorts" from footage of old basketball games. Craig had an over-sized sweatshirt he rarely wore before that now left his midriff showing, and a pair of baggy jeans which he quickly turned into cutoffs. They felt tight as hell, but was the only solution he could think of. Clay couldn't find any clothes that he could make work, so he took his bed sheets and made a toga, which fit him nicely. They each had to go barefoot, as none of their shoes even came close to fitting.

The three of them then started walking to school (it was only a half mile away). Cars would suddenly slam on their brakes as the bewildered drivers saw the giant teen boys walking along the sidewalk. This even caused a car to wreck into a tree as its driver stared at them, forgetting to stop. Other students walking to school gave them distance, scared, and too stunned to speak. One girl even ran away, screaming.

"What do you think, Craig," Clay asked, "isn't this pretty cool?"

"Yeah, we're the kings of the school now!" Craig responded.

"I dunno, guys," Kyle said, "people seem to be afraid of us. One of them might call the cops or something."

"For what?" Clay asked. "We haven't done anything wrong. There's no law against being tall."

"Yeah, but we're not just tall," Kyle shot back. "We're freakin' giants!"

As they got to the school building, they saw two of their friends who were their age, Patrick and Andrew, talking to each other by the bus stop. Patrick was a scrawny Japanese-American boy, who even at 15 was only 4' 11". He had shaggy black hair, and was wearing a short sleeve button up shirt with a white t-shirt underneath it and khaki cargo shorts. Andrew was formerly the tallest of their group of friends, at 6 foot even. He played center on the basketball team with Kyle. He had spiky brown hair, pale skin and a thick build, and was wearing jeans and a t-shirt.

Clay called out to them, "Hey, guys, do you notice something different about us?"

Patrick and Andrew turned to look at the three of them, and their mouths dropped open. "Craig?" Andrew said. "Clay? Kyle? Is that you?"

"None other," Craig responded. "What do you think?"

Patrick was dumbfounded. "How...? What...?"

The three boys quickly summed up what happened last night. "Whoa, cool!" Patrick said. "So it just happened? No reason?"

"None that we can think of," Kyle said. "Maybe it was something we ate."

The rest of the school day was equally as interesting. Word quickly spread among the students and teachers about the three boys, and everyone was talking about them, at the lockers, in the cafeteria, in the teachers lounge, and even whispers during classes. Most of their teachers tried to ignore it and teach their normal lesson plan, but each of them noticed lots of stares coming their way throughout the day. Clay and Craig loved the attention, while Kyle, being a little shyer, was uncomfortable, but got used to it.

At the end of the day, Craig and Clay went home, inviting Patrick to come with them, while Kyle and Andrew had to stay for a basketball game, luckily a home game. Even before the team got to the gym, the coach had made a few adjustments. Kyle, a former bench-warmer, was now the starting center, and Andrew shifted over to forward. The opposing team took one look at Kyle as they came out for their warm-ups, and stood frozen in their tracks. During the game, Kyle had ten blocks, twelve rebounds and scored 30 points, but also shared the ball with his teammates, earning eleven assists, the first quadruple-double in school history. Their team ended up dominating the game, winning 72-36 (with 26 of the opposing team's points scored in the fourth quarter, after Kyle was finally taken out of the game).

As the game ended, Kyle's team rallied around him, all giving him five and slapping his back. Kyle was pleased with himself. Maybe this whole growth issue was a good thing after all.

After the game and a quick shower, Andrew took Kyle's invitation to come to his house. When he got there, Janet was sitting at the kitchen table, staring into the distance, while Craig, Clay, and Patrick were playing video games in the living room. Craig and Clay took up the whole couch, so Patrick had pulled in a chair from the kitchen.

"Oh, hey, Kyle...Andrew," Janet said as they walked in. "Your brothers told me what happened last night. I don't know how, but I guess it's a good thing. Right?" She said, with a half smile.

"Yeah, I guess," Kyle said. "I, uh, I'm now a starter." He noticed that his mother had an open can of Miller Lite sitting on the table, and out of the corner of his eye saw two more cans in the trash can which was empty this morning. He guessed his mom didn't know quite what to make of this situation.

"Well, of course!" Janet said, "Your coach would be crazy not to make you a starter!"

Kyle chuckled, "I suppose so."

"Well," his mother said after a moment's silence, "I think I'm going to go ahead and turn in early tonight." She turned to Craig, Clay, and Patrick. "Don't play that thing too loud, boys, and, uh... don't stay up too late." She then went off to her bedroom, shutting the door behind her.

Kyle was a bit torn; he knew they were upsetting their mother, but he didn't know what to do about it. He seemed to be the only one of the three concerned about what was happening.

The five boys continued to play games for another hour or so. Around 10:00, they were playing a racing game, when Kyle began to feel dizzy again. "Uh oh," he said.

Craig turned to Kyle. "Hey, you feel that too?" Kyle nodded.

Clay's eyes lit up. "Oh yeah, you know what that means, right?"

Patrick and Andrew looked at each other. "What what means?" Andrew asked. "What's happening, guys?"

But the three boys didn't answer as they began to grow again.

"Holy shit!" Patrick said. "Look!"

The growth seemed to be slightly more intense than last time. The already-tight clothes on each of the boys stretched even further. Clay's toga, having the most leeway, stayed on, though it was starting to reveal more than intended, but Kyle's and Craig's clothes ripped to shreds and fell off their bodies, leaving them naked. All three boys were overwhelmed with the powerful feeling of growth, and they all had massive hard-ons which were now visible to Patrick and Andrew.

Since Craig and Clay were sitting on the couch, the sides of their bodies began to press against each other, but they were so overwhelmed with the pleasure of growing that they didn't notice. However, they did notice their heads beginning to press against the ceiling, and their legs reaching across the room.

"Dude!" Patrick said, "You guys are going to outgrow the house!"

"Yeah!" Andrew agreed. "Is it gonna stop anytime soon?"

"I... don't... know..." was all the Clay could muster in reply.

In fact the growth was speeding up. Realizing this, Kyle said. "We gotta get outside!"

He gathered all his strength and started crawling on his hands and knees towards the porch door, motioning for his brothers to follow. He barely squeezed out the glass door, and stood up outside, looking back towards the house for Clay and Craig.

Jason let out a loud gasp when he saw his brother standing before him. Suddenly, he realized that his 8 year-old brother had experienced a tremendous growth spurt overnight. He was now looking UP to him.

“Hey Jason… You’ve shrunk… Or have I gotten taller?” Jake chuckled in his usual voice, before he walked up to his older brother, who was just standing there with his jaw wide open. For the first time ever, Jake was looking down at his older brother by almost six inches! Jake was almost six feet tall!

“Awesome! I’m like way taller than you!” Jake cheered. “I guess I’m the big bro now, little bro!”

“What…. How… Nobody grows that fast! How did this happen?” Jason wondered.

Jake places his hands under Jason’s armpits before he gently lifted his smaller brother off the floor, keeping his feet dangling above the ground.

“Hey! Not only am I bigger than you, but I’m stronger than you, too, little bro!” Jake chuckled, in his high-pitch voice.

Jason couldn’t believe it! His little bro had sprouted muscle and these long arms and legs overnight! Now, he was holding him suspended in mid air like a rag doll!

“I’m the big bro from now on, even though I’m younger than you! Isn’t that great?” Jake laughed, as he set Jason down on the floor.

Jason could only wonder what was going to happen next…

1443.content:
During the night, Jake had unusual dreams about giants stomping on things and rampaging through cities. It was a weird series of dreams, ones that he had never had before. What made it even weirder was that halfway through the dream, HE became one of the giants, stomping through a city and knocking down buildings. When he woke up in the morning, his body was drenched with sweat, and he was feeling a dull throbbing down between his legs. Looking at it, he noticed his thing had grown and gotten hard. He had never experienced anything like it before, and he wasn't sure what it meant, but he knew that he liked it.

After getting dressed in his favorite red-and-black-striped t-shirt and shorts, he walked into the kitchen. He saw a note taped to the table. It read: "Jason and Jake, Your father and I had to go out to your Aunt's to help clean up after a pipe burst. We'll be gone all morning and not back until 3:00 or so. Please stay at the house and help yourself to cereal or any of the microwave meals in the freezer. Love, Mom." Jake smiled. He would have the whole house to himself for a little while! Well, except for his stupid older brother…

Jake grabbed a bowl of cereal, pouring some of milk on to it, picked up a spoon from the silverware drawer and took it to the den. It was a Saturday, which meant that his favorite cartoons were on. Luckily, the TV was currently off and the couch was empty, so he sat down, turned it on and lowered the volume, so as not to wake up his brother.

Five minutes in, however, Jason came walking in, with bed-head hair and wearing only his boxers. "Hey, twerp," he said, "I'm gonna go outside to get the newspaper; when I'm back, I get the remote. I wanna watch SportsCenter."

"But--" Jake tried to protest but Jason sped outside without even listening to his brother. At first, he felt like crying, but then, he started to get angry. "Stupid Jason," he said to himself, "All he ever does is push me around and get his own way. If only--"

While thinking this, Jake suddenly felt his skin begin to tingle. Looking down, he noticed that his legs were becoming a bit longer and his clothes were starting to feel tighter. A little bit of his stomach began to peak through under his shirt, and more and more of his thigh was being revealed. "What the-- Am I growing?"

Jake just stood there, five inches shorter than Jason, his older brother, who was out on the lawn picking up the newspaper from the driveway, when he was suddenly overcome by an odd sensation in his stomach. First, it started out as a light rumbling sound, which came from deep inside of him. The rumbling then spread out as a wave of odd tingling that spread to his limbs all over his body.

Jake then felt an odd cramping feeling everywhere, which made it really hard for him to move for a few moments. What was happening? In the meantime, Jason had walked out on the lawn and bent down in order to pick up the Saturday edition of the newspaper from the driveway. The large bundle of paper was packed with advertising and coupons, and the first thing that Jason wanted to read was the sports section. While Jason was standing there, peering over the sports page, Jake was standing in the door opening while he was feeling these weird sensations as they traveled through his body. He could barely move for a few moments.

Then, it happened.

Jake suddenly felt his bones in his arms and legs crack. It didn’t hurt at all. But they cracked due to an amazing growth spurt!

KKKKKKRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!

Jake’s mouth just dropped open as he realized his legs were stretching out, making him stand taller than he was just a few moments before! His entire perspective was changing! Everything that was around him: The wall, the door opening, the mailbox, the door opening… Everything suddenly seemed to be getting smaller! Jake just looked around in confusion. How could this be possible? Did kids grow that fast? Jake felt as if he had suddenly grown at least six inches in a matter of thirty seconds! The door opening seemed shorter, as well as the mailbox, the wall, and the ceiling in the kitchen didn’t seem that high anymore! Was he taller?

The weird growth spurt stopped just as abruptly as it started, leaving Jake wondering what had happened to him. What was even stranger to him was that his older brother Jason suddenly didn’t seem that tall anymore! In fact… As Jake looked on while Jason was reading the newspaper, Jake noted that he was no longer looking up to his brother. He was looking straight at him!

Jason folded up the newspaper and started walking towards the house, when he looked up and saw Jake standing there. At first, he didn’t say anything. He looked up, then he looked away, before he quickly looked back at Jake with a more surprised expression on his face.

When Jason walked right up to him and walked right through the door opening, the brothers were now staring at each other, face-to-face.

A wide grin now appeared on Jake’s face.

Jake was a whole inch taller than his older brother!

144311.content:
"What the--" Jason cried out. "Jake? What happened to you?"

Jake's grin kept getting wider as he continued to stare at his older brother, now able to tilt his head down to do so. "I don't know!" he said. "I just was standing here in the living room, and all of the sudden, I just heard my bones begin to creak and my clothes got tighter!"

"B-but--" Jake stammered, "that's impossible! No one grows that fast!"

"Well," Jake said as he stretched, revealing his lean fit stomach as his shirt rode up even further, "I guess I do!" Without another word, the younger brother headed back to the couch, plopping down on it, sending the pillows at the other end flying for a second.

Jason stood in the middle of the living room, staring at his kid brother. He rubbed his eyes, trying to see if he was just imagining things, but sure enough, Jake was still the same height when he opened them again.

Shaking his head, he sat down on the couch next to him. He saw that his brother still held the remote control. It seemed as if he had tightened his grip around it, not wanting to let it go for any reason. Jason began to open his mouth, but then stopped. There was no way Jake would give him the remote now, and he would no longer be able to make him do it.

He had a choice to make. He could continue to try to fight and bully his little brother, hoping that the age difference would outweigh the size difference, or he could try to start being nice, get on his brother's good side, and hope that Jake would let him do some of the stuff he wanted to do if reciprocated.

It was a tough decision, but Jason realized that if Jake kept growing like this, fighting would end up being a losing proposition. He decided to try and start being nice to Jake.

"Hey, Jake, what is this cartoon?" Jason asked, hoping he could get his brother to see he was interested in him.

Jake was lounging down on the couch, his feet dangling off the edge. Never taking his eyes off of the TV, he answered, "Batman: The Brave and the Bold." He seemed to not care that Jason was asking him anything now, still watching the show.

Jason looked at the TV. He didn't really understand what was supposed to be going on with this show; the characters seemed way different from the Batman show he watched just five years ago when he was Jake's age. Nevertheless, he sat and watched it for a good ten more minutes, until the next commercial break.

Taking a deep breath, he tried a different tactic. "So, Jake… do you want to go do anything today after this cartoon is over?"

Jake sat up, looking at Jason with a hint of excitement in his eyes. "You mean… together?"

Nodding, Jason forced a smile. "Yeah, together! In fact, we could take the train down to Highland Park and see the SMU football game. Dad's not using his tickets today and said we could use them if we wanted."

Jake jumped to his feet, nearly exploding with energy. "Yeah!" he looked incredibly excited, hopping up and down in place. Jason's smile became a little more genuine. Something was kinda nice about causing his brother to become so happy.

After a few seconds, though, Jake stopped, a weird look coming over his face. "Uh, Jason?" he said.

"What?"

In answer, Jake's bones began to creak again, and his body stretched up in one small spurt. Jason could see his brother getting larger with his own two eyes! Within five seconds, he added another six inches to his height. His shirt now seemed like it was about to tear, the sleeves nearly bursting around his larger arms, and the shorts seemed to be getting skin-tight. Jake got a little thrill out of seeing the rest of the world get smaller in comparison, and the compressed feeling the tight clothes were giving him was only a small negative in an otherwise great situation.

After the growth stopped, Jake gave a little flex-pose with his arms, causing the sleeves and back to finally rip open. He looked at the torn clothing, then turned back to his brother, giggling.

"Oops," he said. "I guess I should try some of your clothes, huh?"

14431121.content:
"GOOO MUSTANGS!!" Jake cheered, waving the pennant he had bought with his allowance.

Jason and Jake sat in two bleacher seats at the forty yard line about fifteen rows up. They were some of the best seats Jason had ever had at a college or pro football game. Of course, SMU tickets weren't exactly hard to come by, but it still was a chance to savor.

Jason also noticed that Jake was showing a lot more interest in the game than he had ever shown for any sport before. He cheered, along with the crowd, at every first down play for the home team, and when they scored the first touchdown, he jumped three feet in the air, screaming his lungs off. Jason was a bit conflicted. On one hand, having his little brother interested in football would give them more in common (insurance, Jason thought, in case the sudden growth spurts continued), but on the other, it was perplexing and a little off-putting to see someone the size of an adult jump up and down wildly and behave like a little kid. But Jason quickly realizes something: Jake WAS just a little kid. No matter how big in stature he ended up getting, Jake would have the same playful attitudes and the same mannerisms. Maybe, if Jason just accepted it, it wouldn't be so bad...

The first quarter ended with the Mustangs up over the visiting Memphis Tigers 7-0. Jake turned to Jason, his face beaming. "That was a great first quarter!" He suddenly noticed his stomach beginning to growl, and tugged on Jason's sleeves. "C'mon, bro, let's go get some nachos or something!"

"I don't have a lot of cash," Jason said, and Jake slumped down in his seat in disappointment. "Besides, the next quarter will have started before e get back!"

"Oh, well... Fine." Jake scowled and stuck his hands in his pockets. When he did so, however, his eyes suddenly lit up. "Hey!" he called out as he removed his hand from the right pocket, pulling out with it a plastic card. "Wow, Dad's debit card!"

"Really? He left his debit card in those shorts" Jason asked, becoming concerned. "Won't he get mad if we spend the money on it?"

Jake thought about it for a moment. "Nahhhh, he'd want us to have a good time at the game" he finally said, grinning. "I'm gonna go use the bathroom and head for the snack bar. Want anything?"

Before Jason could open his mouth in reply, however, Jake had already jumped out of his seat, climbed over the two rows to the aisle, and left. Jason thought about heading after him so that he wouldn't be alone, but he figured a nearly six-foot-tall eight-year-old could more than likely fend for himself.

In the bathroom, Jake enjoyed not having to use the smaller "kid's-sized" urinals any more, being able to use the big ones. He chuckled to himself at being so excited over a relatively trivial thing. "It's just another benefit of growing up, I guess," he thought to himself. As he finished up in the bathroom, though, he felt a faint buzzing inside his body, and his bones made a familiar cracking noise.

"Oh, boy!" Jake said, a huge grin forming on his mouth.

The second quarter started, and the Tigers had the ball. Their offense was primarily running focused, gaining four or five yards per down, eating up a lot of clock. By the time Jason could see his younger brother heading back his way, carrying an armful of food, half the quarter had gone by, and the Tigers had to settle for a field goal from the ten yard line, bringing the score to SMU 7, Memphis 3.

"That took you long enough, Ja-- Whoa!!" Jason's jaw dropped open as he saw his brother up close. He had grown substantially during the time he was gone, now towering over Jason as well as all of the other fans at the game. People's heads turned to watch the nearly seven-foot tall eight-year-old as he passed. 

His clothes had gotten super-tight, the button on his jeans undone and the pants staying up only because of the tightly-fastened belt. The t-shirt now revealed most of his lean stomach, and the shorts had tightened considerably, revealing more of a bulge than Jason cared to see.

For his part, Jake didn't look uncomfortable or embarrassed at all, but more thrilled. "It just happen to me again in the bathroom," he explained to Jason's bewildered face as he handed him a giant soft pretzel. "Isn't it great?! I'm finally getting my growth spurt!" Every movement he made, every twist of his body, seemed like it was about to cause his clothes to rip apart in tatters, but somehow, they stayed on. 

Jason wasn't sure what to think or do. As he took the drink and food Jake had gotten him, he thought about just ditching the game and trying to find some new clothes for his suddenly-huge younger brother. But there was still plenty if game left, over two quarters, and it wouldn't exactly be fair to leave so early, especially for Jake. Finally, Jason decided to...
