144311211.content:
Jason decided it would be best to stay till the game was over. For one, Jake seemed to be enjoying himself, and he figured with another increase in his size, it would be better to stay on his younger brothers good side. Plus, at this point he wasn’t even sure he could make him leave. He decided, resolutely though, that he would keep an eye on his brother in case any extreme growth started to occur in this crowd of people, so he could get them out of there as soon as possible. At first nothing seemed to be too off. Jake still seemed to be having a great time, possibly an even better one considering he seemed to be engaging with a number of the adults around them, who didn’t seem at all put off by his apparent gargantuan size, coming to accept it rather quickly.

It was nearing the end of the third quarter that Jason started to become worried. He had relaxed over the course of the game as it hadn’t seemed like Jake was growing any longer. But upon his return from a second food trip, of which he had assured his older brother, in a rather authoritary tone that there father “would want” Approve of, if they were hungry, Jason noticed some small but noticeable changes to his brother.

He wasn’t taller, which was a sincere godsend, but other things had changed. For starters, his body didn’t necessarily look like the stretched out version of an eight year old it had previously. Rather, his stomach was starting to develop some distinct abdominal muscles, while hit chest and arms seemed to have ballooned just a bit larger, straining their fathers shirt even tighter. It wasn’t just the increased mass that became apparent, at least to Jason, upon his return. His voice seemed a little deeper, and louder for that matter, and the beginnings of peach fuzz looked to be developing on face. Patchy, albeit present, facial hair. On an eight year old! Had it not been for his height, what could’ve thought he was 15, rather than eight. But with his gargantuan size, people were just assuming he was an adult. Which brought you to your last point of alarm. In his hands he held a foot long, some chili fries, and nachos, all situated in a tray in his left hand, and quite a large Beer in his right hand. The adults around them didn’t seemed at all disturbed by the notion of this eight year old drinking, and why would they, he was huge.
It also became readily apparent, as he settled down next to you, that he had no intention of sharing his food. But that was besides the point.
“Jake what do you think you’re doing?!? You’re eight years old, you’re not old enough to be drinking a beer!” You all but whisper-yelled into his ear.
His response took Jason further off guard, as he took a large swing, and without turning his attention away from the game said “Ah, don’t worry about it champ, just enjoy the game. Plus I didn’t even initially ask for it, they asked me if I wanted one! They assumed I was old enough, how cool is that?!?” He said as he shoveled a handful of nachos in his mouth, “Aw man and sorry about the food, little guy, they gave me the drink and all of the sudden my hands were full, didn’t have enough to carry any snacks for you.” With that, he ruffled his hands through the hair on the top of your head, leaving a distinct residue of chip crumbs, and French fry grease on the top of your head.
Jason peered up at him startled. He didn’t seem at all contrite. In fact he seemed a great deal self assured in his ac—“Wait, did you just call me ‘little guy’?”
He glanced over, no, DOWN at his older brother for the first time since since returning to his seat. “Well I mean, you aren’t exactlg big, are you? I mean no one here is that big, I might just be the tallest one here. Taller than the football players even. But hey, like I said earlier, just because you’re older, doesn’t mean you should be in charge.” And with that he turned his attention back to the game.
As it progressed through the fourth quarter, and SMU steadily increased their lead, Jason noticed Jakes interest slowly waning. As he was about to broach the topic of leaving though, his brother opened his mouth.
“Hey you wanna head outta here soon, these clothes are starting to get uncomfortable, plus I could go for some dinner.” Jason wasn’t going to argue with that. His brothers clothes looked about 6 sizes to small on him, riding high and low everywhere, and leaving little to the imagination. As he gather the trash around him, he heard a slight ‘oomph’ from beside him, and a slight shake of the bench. Turning to his right he came face to face with the source. Though he couldn’t say he was surprised. Jake sat there having just torn the sleeves off of their fathers shirt, stretching his arms in the air and flexing his biceps. They really had grown, as had what seemed like a forest of hair under his arms. What was going on with his brother? .
“Ah, well that’s a whole lot more comfortable, but we should still head out, I need some clothes that fit, at least for a little while. This stuff is too tight!”
“Alright, lets take the bus to the mall, and then head on home and I can cook us up some dinner.”
“Sounds good to me, champ” He said as he drained the rest of his beer, gave an earth shaking belch, and ruffled Jason’s hair. Again.

The bus was cramped. Especially since Jake could barely fit in one seat, his hair lightly grazing the ceiling if he stood. As they pulled up to the stop at the mall, the two brothers quickly shuffled out.
“Come on little bro, I gotta get some new stuff, dads clothes are starting to choke me” Jake said as he raced ahead of Jason. He couldn’t deny it either. All of it looked like a second skin on his brother, who at this point seemed to be changing by the hour. Again, he hadn’t grown any taller, or at least not by a lot, but there were other changes that couldn’t be unnoticed. For one, though it was all blonde, he was now sporting a pelt of hair on his legs. Furthermore, what he has deemed as peach fuzz earlier, was now starting take on the distinct look of a flourishing beard, albeit, blonde again. And then there was his musculature. He wasn’t a body builder by any means, but given his height and the size of there father, his slight increase in mass was proving to looking nonetheless intimidating. Plus there were this modifiers he kept on using, “little bro, little man, champ”, if Jason heard them one more time he might scream. But he couldn’t. He was still unsure about their shifting power dynamic and he didn’t want to unnecessarily test his brother.

He rolled into the “big and tall” shop no more than two minutes after his brother. With that said, it seemed Jake was already chatting up the sales attendant.

“I’m looking for a material with a bit of give in it, it’s gotta be stretchy or it isn’t gonna work.” He said in a rather sure tone.

The young man helping him looked like he was shaking in his boots. He was dwarfed by Jake, stand at around 6’2, but still towered over you.

“Well sir, I can uh direct you um over here. All this stuff has plenty of stretch.”

Jason was slightly disturbed by the kids use ‘sir’ but was quickly torn from his reverie as his brother turned to him “hey Kiddo I think these should be a good fit, but I’m gonna try them on real quick. Then we can head out of here”
As Jake made his way to the back, the sales attendant looked towards Jason.
“Is that your older brother?”
“Uhhhhh, well, I’m actually— yes. Yes he is”
“Holy shit he’s huge, you’re one lucky kid, I’d kill to be that big one day. At least you got good genes”.
With that Jake came barreling out of the back, debit card ready. Jason was surprised with his confidence, though not to the degree he had been earlier, as jake purchased the set of clothes, and a snack from the food court on the way out, without any trepidation about using their fathers money.
:::::::::::::::::::::::
As they arrived home, Jake quickly bound upstairs to change into his new outfit. As he came back down the stairs, his brother was startled. Rather than make him look more normal, the form fitting material he had bought only served to accentuate his increased growth. His traps and lats pushes against the material, with his arms filling the sleeves completely and his chest burgeoning against the shirt. On the flip aside, the shorts hugged his butt, abdfront bulge equally, highlighting a definite marinating in his brother. It was alarming.
“Come on man, start whipping up some grub. What do we have in here? Ha, ok, make me this steak and uh some of those potatoes and some of that pasta. Thanks little guy” he said as he carried a bag of chips and the remainder of the gallon of milk to family room and plopped down on the couch, forgoing his usual cartoons for some Saturday night football. As Jason gazed over at him from the island in the kitchen where he was making dinner, he was continuously noticing differences in his big brother. Ugh no, little brother. He was currently alternating between shoveling chips into his mouth and taking long gulps from the milk, all while yelling at the refs on the TV. As he finished up the ‘snacks’ he crumpled up both in his meaty looking paws and came up to his brother. Jason stared up, not so much frightened as intimidated. The boy he had bullied this morning was a whole different person now. A man really. He was breathing slightly heavily, chip crumbs and milk in his now full beard, some hairs sticking out from beneath the collar of his shirt, and now large muscles pushing out from every corner of his body against his clothes. He really looked like he could be one of the SMU players.

“It’ll be just a sec-“
“Yeah whatever little bro, just holler when it’s done” he said as he turned to walk away, mumbling under his breath “damn shirt is already getting small, haha” as he grabbed their dads beer from the fridge.

If he looked close enough, Jason could swear he saw his brothers muscles growing too

1443112112.content:
Jake cut into his steak rather forcefully, sticking a piece in his mouth and and tossing it back with a sip of beer. He liked these changes. He was huge now, and it gave him a thrill. Jason barely came up to his chest now, and looked downright puny. Like a runt, honestly. The kid had barely any muscle definition to his body, and maybe three hairs on his upper lip and chin. As far as Jake was concerned, Jason was the little brother now.
With each bite of potato, and steak and pasta also came a residual feeling of some type of growth. It wasn’t like earlier where he could feel his bones cracking to make him taller. No. This was different. It was like his body was searching for energy to make his muscles grow bigger and with each bite, they did.
He glanced over at his brother across the room, perched in the sitting chair, like some sort of bird. He was eating peanuts, watching the game wide eyed, all bare arms and small legs, every so often glancing over at Jake, thinking he wouldn’t notice.

Jonathan let the door slam behind him. "I'm home!" he called out, as he threw down his sports bag, which had his soccer clothes in it. He had just finished competing in a match, where he had scored two goals, including the game winner, and was feeling really good about himself. "Anybody here?" he called out.

"We're in here," his older brother, Jake, called from the living room. Jonathan went into the living room and saw both of his brothers watching TV. "How was the game?" Jake asked.

"Awesome, as usual," Jonathan said, rather smugly. "I scored both goals, and was the hero of the game! Everyone was cheering for me at the end."

"Don't get cocky, little bro," Jake said. "I can still outplay you any day of the week."

"Yeah, don't get cocky!" Alex, his younger brother, repeated. He had the habit of repeating his older two brothers recently.

"Well, I'd like to see you try," Jonathan responded. "Coach says if I keep playing this well, I might be able to go pro someday."

"Yeah, pro at being a dweeby little brother," Jake said as he stood up, reached over and mussed up Alex's hair. Alex hated when his brother did that, but, since he was still outmatched in both the height and the strength category, he let it slide.

He walked over to the kitchen. "Did mom leave us anything for dinner before she left?" he asked.

"Nah, Jonathan," Jake replied, "just fix one of the frozen dinners. That's all we really have right now."

"We also have a brand new gallon of milk!" Alex chimed in.

Jonathan rolled his eyes. He hated the frozen dinners that his mom always bought, and he didn't really drink milk any more, even with his cereal, as he preferred it dry. He opened the fridge, looking for something, anything that sounded better. It was pretty bare; the only other things he saw all looked like they had mold on them and had been in there for months.

Alex had walked into the kitchen, and was looking into the fridge with Jonathan. "Pretty slim pickins, isn't it?" Alex asked.

"Yeah," Jonathan replied, shrugging. Then his eyes fell onto the gallon of milk. It looked whiter than usual, and popped out at him. It just gave off the sense of being fresh, and he had the oddest urge to have a glass.

"That milk sure looks good, doesn't it?" Alex asked. "Why don't we each have a glass?"

"You can count me out," Jake called from the living room. "Milk is for babies."

"Whatever," Jonathan muttered. He grabbed the gallon and set it out on the counter, then grabbed two glasses. He poured them full and looked at the milk. There was something different about it, but he couldn't quite put his finger on it. Shaking it off as nothing, he put the milk back in the fridge, handed the glass to his kid brother, and they both sat down at the table to drink it.

The rest of the night went by as normal. The boys watched some more TV, they each did their homework, played a little video games, then went to bed. Jonathan and Alex shared a room, while Jake got his own room down the hall. As Jonathan brushed his teeth, he felt an odd gurgling in his stomach, not like he was sick, but like something was causing his stomach to work overtime. Shrugging, he rinsed out his mouth, went back into his room, and turned out the light.

"Goodnight, Jonathan," Alex said, lying down in his bed.

"Goodnight, Alex," Jonathan responded.

As Jonathan drifted off to sleep, he thought about how good it felt to be the hero at the game, and how much he wished he could feel the same way at home. It didn't take long for him to fall asleep, and when he did so, he was out like a light.

The tingling in his legs intensified tremendously, especially in his calves and in his thighs. Luckily, he could see his reflection in the mirror, which was hanging above the sink.

"Oh, man... My legs feel kinda funny... I... Uhh... What's happening to me?"

His calves inflated like helium balloons! They filled out, packing in more and more muscle, while they were surrounded with thick rope-like veins which delivered blood to all parts of the muscles and legs. Jonathan could feel the strength in his legs increasing more and more as his calves increased in size, becoming like tennis balls, then like softballs, and finally his calves grew to the size of melons, giving his legs unprecedented power to leap to amazing heights!

Next, Jonathan felt his quads increase in width and in depth at the same time, as layers upon layers of muscle continued to grow on his legs between his knees and his waist. This cords of ripping muscles just continued to pack on to his existing frame, making his legs grow wider and thicker, to the point where his legs started to look like massive columns of mighty rockets of power. His mighty leg-muscles would give him enough thrust, that he could bring his body into motion at amazing speed. The boy now had superhuman strength in his legs, and he had the strength to outrun a lion.

"Oooooh man.... What the heck happened to my legs?" Jonathan groaned, as he closed his eyes as his legs inflated with outrageous muscle. After a minute had passed, he opened his eyes again, and his mouth dropped open when he realized that his legs were no longer "human" legs anymore, but the legs of a GOD.

"Oh wow..." he said, as he slowly walked towards the mirror. "My legs... I'm gonna play soccer with THAT?"

His legs felt thicker... heavier... STRONGER...

He had to get used to walking, for a few moments. He quickly put on his underwear, and a pair of shorts and sneakers. Then he slipped out through the back door, and went for a quick run. In no time at all, Jonathan was picking up speed, as he was approaching the street, and he noticed that he was passing the cars that was driving on the road!

"Whoa! I can run FAST!" he cheered, as he slowed down and analyzed the amazing distance he had covered in just a minute. "I have covered a mile in less than a minute! No way!"

Jonathan couldn't believe how fast he had become. Again, he looked down and realized that his legs had become enormous! They had grown into huge pillars of muscle!

"Oh man... Soccer practice is gonna be GREAT!" Jonathan chuckled, as he turned around and sprinted home. Of course, he got home in less than a minute, and he wasn't even tired.
1551121.title: He REALLY Wanted More Milk.

choices: Jonathan's legs just keep on growing
Giant legs for a 14-year-old boy
15511211.content:
Originally by: rextorres

Soccer practice was a breeze for Jonathan the following day. With his mighty legs, he was able to run faster and jump higher than everybody else on the team. He scored three goals that morning, and he outran everyone on the team, who was left in complete awe. Nobody could understand how he became so fast and how his legs had become so strong overnight.

That afternoon, when Jonathan came home after practice, he dashed for teh fridge and got out the carton of milk. Right away, he poured a full glass of milk, since he was very thirsty from running after the soccer ball the entire morning. He drank the entire glass in one gulp, before pouring a second glass full, which he also drank in one, big gulp.

"Aaahhh... Boy, that just hits the spot..." he smiled, forgetting that this milk is what made his legs grow so muscular in the first place.

When he walked into his bedroom, he noticed something odd. Everything seemed a bit... smaller...

"Hmm... What's going on?" he wondered.

Jonathan walked up to his bookcase, when it struck him. He was now looking straight at the top shelf! Whoa!

"Hey! Have I gotten taller?"

Jonathan sprinted to the bathroom, where he realized that he had grown about three inches, since he had his glasses of milk. But, his upper body seemed the same. When he stepped back from the mirror, he saw it. Then, when he looked down, it REALLY hit him: The distance from his head to the floor had increased! His LEGS! His legs had gotten BIGGER!

"Whoa!!!!" he gasped, as he began to spot the difference in the mirror. His legs were slowly growing bigger and BIGGER! Not only were they getting longer, but bigger all over! His feet, his quads, his calves... everything was getting wider, longer, thicker and wider! His legs were now almost like that of an adult... He had the legs of an adult, even though he was still fourteen years old!

"Oh man! My legs are making me taller!" he wondered, as he saw his body grow slightly out of proportion. His upper body was exactly the same, but his legs just seemed like they were a bit too big for his body, and they were STILL growing!

As he looked down, he saw how his shorts were barely covering his huge, expanding quads. They began to fit him like a speedo, rather than like a pair of shorts! His feet were also expanding, to the point where he had to take off his shoes and his socks. His feet had inflated from size 9 to size 13 in just a few minutes!

"Crap! My legs are getting too BIG!"

Jonathan just stood there, as he slowly passed 6 feet in height. His upper body was barely over 2 feet, while his legs covered well over 3 feet in length, and they were still growing!

"KKKKKKKKRRRR!!!!" was the sound of cracking bones, coming from within Jonathan's skeletal structure, as his legs were growing thicker, longer, and wider, with no end in sight!
15511211.title: Jonathan's Legs Grow Even MORE Massive!

As Jeremiah went back to work, He hardly noticed some parts of him were starting to grow bigger.

His ears seemed to grow slightly bigger.

It was a bright, sunny day, yet for a spring day it wasn't too warm and there was very little humidity.
So Jeremiah couldn't understand why he started feeling hot.
Hot, and itchy.

It was then he saw his hands; they seemed to be much bigger than normal.

'What gives?' he wondered, scratching the back of his neck and discovering that he was in need of a haircut.

Also, he discovered something else; his farmer cap no longer seemed to fit his head. it seemed at least 2 sizes too small. That ain't right. Maybe I'm hallucinating, Jeremiah erroneously surmised. He saw his hand start growing.

There was no escaping it now.

info.brief_description: Genetically modified milk causes unexpected growth in those who drink it.
info.description:
Different people across the world receive all different kinds of growth due to some unusual properties of the milk they drank. This could make them grow huge, become muscular, or other variations on that theme. What they do when they grow is now up to you!

I prefer: Giants (male), Muscle growth, bursting out of clothes, gay or bisexual guys, teens, tasteful nudity and sexuality, stomping around cities, character and plot development.
I allow: giantesses (female), other kinds of growth, light vore, violence, straight characters and lesbians.
I dislike (and will delete or modify): heavy vore, scat, watersports, and other "toilet" functions, exceptionally poor grammar and spelling.
I reserve the right to change these criteria at any time.

Please try to write more than one or two sentences per chapter, and try to avoid simple "choice" chapters unless you are following up one of the choices with a longer chapter(s). Also, please try to leave as many choices as possible. If you can't think of an option to write, just leave "Reader's Choice", or something like that.

And most of all...

HAVE FUN!!!

Check out my portfolio citywalker (47) for my other sci-fi and fantasy stories featuring transformation, muscle development, and growth! And email me if you have any questions or just want to talk.
